JUDGES: David Thór Björgvinsson;Ján Šikuta;Lech Garlicki;Nicolas Bratza;Päivi Hirvelä
TEXT: The first and second applicants are married and the third and fourth applicants are their children . They are of NORP - Cypriot origin and have NORP and NORP nationality . They were born in DATE , DATE and DATE respectively and live in GPE . The fifth applicant , ORG , is a company incorporated in GPE on DATE , under registration no . DATE . The applicants are represented before ORG and ORG , lawyers practising in GPE .
The facts of the case as submitted by the applicants , may be summarised as follows .

The first CARDINAL applicants were all born and brought up in GPE , in northern GPE . Until DATE they all lived together in their home in the town of GPE . The first applicant had established his own architectural office in GPE , in which he employed CARDINAL persons . The applicants are the owners or part owners of properties in northern GPE , including the family home ( owned by the second applicant alone ) , various building plots , an office , houses , an orange grove and CARDINAL shops .

The fifth applicant is a family company , co - owned by the first and second applicants . The first applicant is also the director and secretary of the company . The registered office of the company was situated in the building owned by the second applicant . The company 's main activities were in land investment and development . It claimed to own property which it had started developing , in the areas of GPE and GPE . In particular , it is the registered owner of a building site in GPE and claims to be entitled to be registered as the owner of a plot of land in GPE as well as the owner of a CARDINAL share in CARDINAL plots of land in GPE . It maintains that it owns CARDINAL of the shares in another limited liabilty company , namely , ORG , incorporated in GPE on DATE , under registration no . DATE . The first and second applicants are CARDINAL of the CARDINAL directors of that company and the first applicant is also the secretary . This company is the owner of CARDINAL plots of land in the district of GPE which were to be divided into CARDINAL building sites .
The applicants stated that in DATE they had to abandon their home , property and possessions . Since DATE , the applicants have not had access to and/or use of their property and home .
